name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy fermented rice crepe filled with spiced potato mixture.
instructions: Soak rice, urad dal and fenugreek seeds for 6 hours.
Grind into smooth batter and ferment overnight.
Heat tawa and spread batter thinly.
Drizzle oil and cook until crispy.
Prepare filling by tempering mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Add onions, turmeric and mashed potatoes.
Place filling inside dosa and fold before serving.
